name: test_e2e_with_logs[126_PATH_DOT_006]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_DOT_006` |
| **Name** | Apache log file access |
| **Category** | PATH |
| **Subcategory** | dot_dot_slash |
| **Severity** | `MEDIUM` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `../../var/log/apache2/access.log`
- **Encoded**: `../../var/log/apache2/access.log`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~36000ms
